About Me

Hi, my name is Hanieh. I have graduated with a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Engineering from Iran University of Science and Technology. Right now, I am a software engineer at Mobile Telecommunication Company of Iran (MCI) . I used to be python back-end developer at Exalab.
